column5: Is there a way to make a pneumatic seat support pole work again? I have one that was working, sort of, and now it will not move. Is there a way to fix this or am I lookin at a trip to the local marina to buy a new one?
Is it all the way down and won't go up

I am interested in this answer also. One of the posts on my boat seems a little sluggish and does not rise to full hight. I have tried adjusting the green screw on the top of the post but it doesn't help. SWIVEL EZE is the manufacturer.  Tom.
I don't think that they can be repaired. I was talking to the marina about one of mine, and they told me I would have to replace it.
I had to replace mine.  They pop up on Kijiji here and there, have an eye.
Thanks Guys,  I was afraid of that.
surprise, marina wants you to buy a new one...
No, it is all the way up and won't go down, I may have to see my doctor..... Given my height that could be a good thing though.
